title: KAPy periods configuration
description: Calculation periods in KAPy are configured through a tab-separated table, with one row per period. The available options are described here. All options are required

id.description: Unique identifier for the period. This can be numeric, but will be treated as a string

name.description: A longer description of the period. This is typically used in the x-axes of plots, so shouldn't be TOO long!

start.description: The start year of the period. The full year is included in the calculation.

end.description: The end year of the period. The full year is included in the calculation.
